SELECT 償還払決定一覧."jigyoshaNo" ,償還払決定一覧."yoshikiNo" ,償還払決定一覧."meisaiNo" ,償還払決定一覧."renban" , ' ' AS fukushiYoguShohinName
,substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceCode", 1, 2) AS serviceCode ,DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiMeisho" AS serviceName ,償還払決定一覧."serviceTanisu" AS kounyuKingaku ,償還払決定一覧."seikyuKingaku" AS shiharaiKingaku ,'6' AS tableKbn
,substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceCode", 1, 2) AS serviceCode ,DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiMeisho" AS serviceName ,償還払決定一覧."tanisu" AS kounyuKingaku ,償還払決定一覧."seikyuKingaku" AS shiharaiKingaku ,'7' AS tableKbn
,substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceCode", 1, 2) AS serviceCode ,DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiMeisho" AS serviceName ,償還払決定一覧."tanisu" AS kounyuKingaku ,償還払決定一覧."seikyuKingaku" AS shiharaiKingaku ,'8' AS tableKbn
,substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceShuruiCode", 1, 2) AS serviceCode ,DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiMeisho" AS serviceName ,償還払決定一覧."hokenbunSeikyugakuTotal" AS kounyuKingaku ,償還払決定一覧."hokenbunSeikyugakuTotal" AS shiharaiKingaku ,'5' AS tableKbn
,'50' AS serviceCode ,DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiMeisho" AS serviceName ,償還払決定一覧."shokujiTeikyohiSeikyugaku" AS kounyuKingaku ,償還払決定一覧."shokujiTeikyohiSeikyugaku" AS shiharaiKingaku ,'4' AS tableKbn
,償還払決定一覧."sagakuKingaku" ,'0' AS dekidakaKbn ,償還払決定一覧."updateCount" FROM
rgdb."DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904" AS 償還払決定一覧
rgdb."DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604" AS 償還払決定一覧

rgdb."DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo" AS 償還払決定一覧
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui" AS DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui
ON substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceCode", 1, 2) = DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiCd"
ON substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceCode", 1, 2) = DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiCd"
ON substring(償還払決定一覧."serviceCode", 1, 2) = DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiCd"
ON DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiCd" = '50'
ON DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiCd" = '50'
AND DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."teikyoKaishiYM" <= 償還払決定一覧."serviceTeikyoYM" AND DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."teikyoshuryoYM" >= 償還払決定一覧."serviceTeikyoYM" WHERE 償還払決定一覧."hiHokenshaNo" = #{hiHokenshaNo} AND 償還払決定一覧."serviceTeikyoYM" = #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND 償還払決定一覧."seiriNo" = #{seiriNo} ORDER BY 償還払決定一覧."jigyoshaNo", 償還払決定一覧."yoshikiNo"
